don t take into consideration the curve at the bottom corner of the hot water bottle depending on the curve of your hot water bottle you may have a small flap of excess material that the bottle doesn t fill if this bothers you could crochet straight edges like the pattern describes turn it inside out stitch down that corner flap and turn it right way round again or you could take the curve into consideration when doing your starting chain chaining fewer stitches and adding increase stitches on the sides over about an inch or so until you reach your required stitches to fit round your bottle shaping of ribbing if you want you can add some shaping to the rib section so that it deceases for the stopper section be careful with how you decrease as you want to maintain the ribbing and also don
